remarks.format: ## Remarks Системный параметр SPI_GETANIMATION возвращает структуру [аниматионинфо](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/sysinfo/base/animationinfo_str.asp) .The SPI_GETANIMATION system parameter gets an [ANIMATIONINFO](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/sysinfo/base/animationinfo_str.asp) structure.
